<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Fri Dec 7 18:25:05 2012">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="decoy hunches" node_id="2068128" parent_e2node="2068126" author_user="winston_farsoul">She asked me to read her a poem</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="855115" parent_e2node="855036" author_user="Cosmyre">What the hell is wrong with mis-matched socks?</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2048894" parent_e2node="1909381" author_user="Intentions">There is no music in money</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098639" parent_e2node="691833" author_user="Auspice">Someone outlined against the sky, the sun too bright to see her face</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098594" parent_e2node="2002503" author_user="Zephronias">the turn calls, and all of the birds are silent</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098439" parent_e2node="1770869" author_user="yannmatin">God is not dead; he is merely unemployed.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2098562" parent_e2node="2098566" author_user="borgo">brotato</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2073497" parent_e2node="177323" author_user="StuartO)))">Hostess</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="kozmund" node_id="1359692" parent_e2node="1359678" author_user="Lucy-S">The Earth's moons</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="tanktop" node_id="1670150" parent_e2node="1381233" author_user="Hermes_wr">Dartmouth</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Pandeism Fish" node_id="2098894" parent_e2node="2098895" author_user="Longwalker">Ocean Locked</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="jessicaj" node_id="2098876" parent_e2node="1319671" author_user="Sol Invictus">Innocent VIII</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1768346" parent_e2node="111144" author_user="KandiMon">Dar Es Salaam</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="1522998" parent_e2node="248642" author_user="Gritchka">Grinding</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="The Custodian" node_id="2098913" parent_e2node="2098912" author_user="Auspice">The NOC and the end of the world</cooled>
